text:
@RealCandaceO @TacticalSilence Just let people go back to work, have them sign a form that they and their family assume all risk.

If they contract Covid-19 then they just can't go to the hospitals. This will keep the hospital beds open for people who tried.

My body, my choice.
Your problem, your choice.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
